definition.name: Google Java Format
definition.description: Automatically format Java files using Google Java Style
definition.author: axel-op

inputs.name: args
inputs.description: Arguments for the Google Java Format executable

inputs.name: files
inputs.description: Pattern to match the files to be formatted

inputs.name: files-excluded
inputs.description: Pattern to match the files to be ignored by this action

inputs.name: skip-commit
inputs.description: By default, this action commits any change made to the files. Set to "true" to skip this commit.

inputs.name: release-name
inputs.description: Release name of Google Java Format to use. Examples: 1.7, v1.24.0... Leave empty to use the latest release compatible with your JDK.

inputs.name: github-token
inputs.description: If provided, will be used to authenticate the calls to the GitHub API.

inputs.name: commit-message
inputs.description: This message will be used for commits made by this action
